ModMetaData.name: Rimhammer - The End Times - Daemons
ModMetaData.author: SickBoyWI
ModMetaData.description:
IF YOU HAVE ISSUES, YOU'LL GET A MUCH FASTER RESPONSE BY POSTING ON MY DISCORD ISSUES-AND-BUGS CHANNEL: https://discord.gg/UCmQbCT
This mod adds Warhammer Daemons into Rimworld. These will start out as a non playable faction that functions similar to the Mechanoids in vanilla. They will be fleshed out to allow summoning and control of them over time.
Dev Notes:
0.0.0.1 2023-07-01 ======================== Development started.
